CustomField.description: sums the ‘Recurring Amount (Change)’ of the opportunities where ‘Simple Status’ = ‘Open’ and ‘Stage’ not equal to ‘Target Account’
CustomField.inlineHelpText: sums the ‘Recurring Amount (Change)’ of the opportunities where ‘Simple Status’ = ‘Open’ and ‘Stage’ not equal to ‘Target Account’
CustomField.label: Value of Open opportunities
